title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for use in LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’) with chat history, model management, and RAG support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-written Go CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with extra helpers for listing, pulling, and deleting models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands in any Discord server.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing the JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package providing the Python client for Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration library that injects an Ollama client bean for Java applications.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with both synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Published Rust crate offering lightweight async bindings to Ollama.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of Modelfile definitions for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma, and more.
